talk1.dialogue: Man, I never thought Aaliyah would enjoy the date that much.
I hope I can make the next one even better.
Fwie Fwie Fwie. Why so happy, my young fellow? Not to worry, I already know. You had a good date!
Not happy to see me? I thought we were student and mentor. Fwie fwie fwie.
You don't have to answer that, I KNOW we have that bond my little fellow. You're just a little shy.
Now now don't give me that look. I'm just trying to lighten up the mood.
Anyhoot, your journey doesn't end here. I'll be hooting for you~.
I swear, i'll never understand this guy.... (press w to continue)
